name: Unidentified_human_slave_(Lourna_Dee)
content:
A human female was a slave of the Zygerrian Alliance during the High Republic Era. While held at a Zygerrian slave camp, the woman contracted a disease from a Gamorrean slave and was declared by the Zygerrian slavers to be lowering the value of the other "merchandise." The lead slaver Vardem Kroleyic prepared to execute her with a blaster in front of Lourna Dee, when Jedi and Republic forces attacked the slaver camp.
The human slave tried to stop Lourna Dee from drawing the slavers' attention by aiding other slaves. She advised Dee to keep her head down and not to worry about the Gamorrean who infected her. She then saved Lourna's life by sacrificing her own. Later, the Twi'lek Sestin Blin reminded Lourna Dee of the human slave.
The slave appeared in flashbacks in the 2021 audio drama The High Republic: Tempest Runner, written by Cavan Scott and performed by a full voice cast.
